signed: signed LRC: Philip Evergood | title LLC, in pencil: Centaurs + Men
text: Philip Evergood is best known as a politically active artist who was committed to workers’ rights and the plight of humanity during his long career. This playful watercolor reveals his youthful immersion in classical themes. Evergood loved art history and studied old master paintings and prints firsthand as a student.
title: Satyrs and Fauns - Bacchanale
